title: (x) Please help identify this script font / 'College' - Machiarge {Tamas}
author: auntiejeffer

comments.content:
The fact that the two e's in College do not match suggests that this is hand lettering.

- Mike Yanega

This is a photo of a t-shirt that somebody is wearing. I think that is why there is a funny angle on the last e. I think the e's actually are the same - just a bad photo. Thanks for your input, though!
Looks like a winner. Nice one, Tamas!

That looks like a great alternative to all the questions we get about Spoleto/OptiSport/Aktuelle. I have to remember this one.

- Mike Yanega
